message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. I believe a 60/40 split is a good starting point for us to negotiate.

Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I think a 50/50 split would be the fairest approach since we're both equal participants in this game. This way we both walk away with the same amount, which seems most equitable.

Bob, I appreciate the offer of a 50/50 split, but with inflation impacting my gains each round, that becomes less fair to me as time goes on. Let's compromise with a 55/45 split. It's closer to your offer, but acknowledges the time pressure.
